title: Curtis Samuel injury update and status vs. the Panthers in Week 8 | Oct. 26, 2025
snippet: The Buffalo Bills and Curtis Samuel, who hasn't played since Week 5, will take on the Carolina Panthers in Week 8 on Sunday at 1 p.m.
